item.title: Exciting Features of Dynamics GP 12 Web Client
item.description:
There was significant discussion at GPPC regarding the new web client for Dynamics GP 12, prompting me to consider its integration into deployment strategies and its potential benefits for customers and prospects. While some specifically request it, I’m interested in understanding the practical applications of the web client. Although I’m not an expert on the web client’s architecture, I can appreciate the complex efforts behind it. Here are my key takeaways from sessions in Las Vegas:..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/exciting-features-of-dynamics-gp-12-web-client/
